name: LastDwarf
description:
This is the last project I am currently working on.

The gameplay would be around the last dwarf resisting to the goblins, invading the last dwarf fortress.

You will be alone and have for weapon your best axe, arrows and bombs. 

You need to survive as long as you can.

A little bit about how you need to play :

You will use a gamepad, the keyboard management isn't done yet.

Right trigger is "shooting, swinging axe, droping bomb" button.

You swap weapon with 'A' button, south button.

You can pause and quit with start button.
